      getAllCouponsWhereTypeIs method get a string that contains either a location , a location and type or location and type and id . . in case the location = "main" it will return a list of coupons with the type provided with max size of 8. in case the location = "category" it will return a list of all coupons with the type provided.

      void Validations.validateCoupon(Coupon coupon, int id, java.lang.String status)
      Validate Coupon A method that validates a coupon in two situations :
      1) when the "Status" is create -
      will check if title is available, will check if this company already has this coupon , will check if the start date is a valid date , will check if end date is a valid date.
